channel.title: W3C Web Cryptography Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Web Cryptography Working Group

item.title: [WebCryptoAPI] variable's value not immediately obvious without looking at linked code sample
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/SubtleCrypto/decrypt

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/SubtleCrypto/decrypt#aes-cbc

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

The code snippet provided does not make it immediately obvious where the variable iv comes from.

What did you expect to see?

Reading the code sample linked in the description Does give enough context to figure this out.

Expected:

iv = window.crypto.getRandomValues(new Uint8Array(16));

Context

However, upon rereading encrypt function I noticed the comment
// iv will be needed for decryption
which then made sense.

Solution:

Since the code snippets look to be copy pasted from the code sample, adding a comment to the decrypt function similar to encrypt function would help make it obvious what the expected value of the variable iv should be.

such as:
// iv used during encryption

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

MDN metadata

Page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/subtlecrypto/decrypt
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/SubtleCrypto/decrypt
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/subtlecrypto/decrypt/index.md
  • Last commit: 6b722db
  • Document last modified: 2023-01-03T03:22:42.000Z

item.title: [WebCryptoAPI] Precise max length for encoding algorithm
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/SubtleCrypto/encrypt

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Supported Algorithm

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

This page is missing information about the algorithm we can use. For example, for the RSA-OAEP there is a limit in the number of bytes you can encrypt. I did not check for the others algorithm but theses limitation are missing in the doc. Just a warning that says "The algorithm can have some limitation such as the size of the data to encode. Check the RFC for more information" would be really helpfull since the error message are basically inexistent at this point in time.

What did you expect to see?

An array with what an algorithm can encode and the limitation

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

MDN metadata

Page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/subtlecrypto/encrypt
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/SubtleCrypto/encrypt
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/subtlecrypto/encrypt/index.md
